channel.title: Radio Theatre
channel.description: The Weekly broadcast of the award winning audio dramas from Focus on the Family, hosted by OnePlace.com
channel.itunes:author: Focus on the Family
channel.itunes:summary: The Weekly broadcast of the award winning audio dramas from Focus on the Family, hosted by OnePlace.com

item.title: The Hiding Place, Part 07 of 09
item.description: "The Hiding Place" is the story of two spinster daughters, Corrie and Betsie, unlikely heroes who became the center of a major underground operation to hide Jewish refugees from the occupying Germans. Even when betrayed and sent away to the dreaded Ravensbruck concentration camp, they manage to create another Hiding Place for those around them. This innovative audio drama closely follows the account of Corrie Ten Boom and features a moving musical score.
